Posts.Content: Jul 13, 2008 05:23AM bjc wrote: I think there must be a misunderstanding somewhere. I was told that with surgery and radiation only there was a 58% chance of recurrence and that number decreases with each treatment option you choose. For instance, if you have hormonal therapy or chemotherapy it decreases, and if you do a combined therapy, hormonal and chemotherapy decreases even more. My oncologist used a tool called Â shared decision making to give me that info. I was diagnosed 3/5/08 . I have a histology grade 3, ER- POSITIVE, nodes negative, tumor size greater than 5 cm. Hope this helps.
Posts.Title: 80 % chance of it coming back!!! Naomi browneyes2323
